alert.note: Alert for Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy; Northern Hidalgo; Southern Hidalgo; Starr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 15 at 9:46AM CST until January 17 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 10 AM CST TUESDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30. For the second Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 27 possible. * WHERE...Hidalgo, Starr, Inland Willacy, and Inland Cameron Counties. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until noon CST today. For the second Freeze Warning, from 5 AM to 10 AM CST Tuesday. For the Freeze Watch, from Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy; Northern Hidalgo; Southern Hidalgo; Starr
